name: Midlife Crisis
description:
Midlife Crisis is game where you play as a man with narcolepsy. Because of his condition he often finds himself in the middle of intense situations that demand immediate action.  From escaping a collapsing temple to waking up in the middle of a bank robbery, you'll need to act fast in order to survive. 

v0.1 Demo - Basement bomb level where you need to defuse a bomb using clues from your environment.

v.0.1.1 - Fixed an issue that caused the bomb to automatically detonate when selected.

WASD - for movement

Space Bar - Jumping

E- Interact with environmnet

Q - bring up bomb riddles

When on the bomb use A and D to switch between modules, S and W to navigate within the module, and e to select your answer for the current module

Created by:  Trey Wilson "RoflWorld" and Logan Rodriguez-Iglesias(Logan109)

Lead Programmer:  Logan Rodriguez-Iglesias

Lead Artist: Trey Wilson

Sounds provided by zapslat.com
